tasks.objective: To establish a low-friction "Rapid Op Instantiation" protocol by creating a standardized GitHub Issue Template. This will enable Operatives to quickly and efficiently log pre-defined or in-progress tasks as Guild Ops, increasing the velocity of `Reputation Matrix` population without the overhead of the full project decomposition ceremony.
tasks.summary_of_changes: Completed deliverables include: 1.  **`quick_op.yml` Issue Template:**, A new YAML file named `quick_op.yml` will be created in the `.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/` directory., This file will define a GitHub Issue Form with the following fields:, Title:** A text input for the full Op title (e.g., `[CCG-DEV-005] Implement Player Score Display`)., Project Prefix:** A dropdown menu allowing the Operative to select the relevant project prefix (e.g., `CHIRON`, `CCG`, `PERS`). This will be used to automatically apply the correct `Project-Slug:` label., Primary Deliverable(s):** A markdown-enabled textarea for a concise list of the Op's outcomes., Skills Demonstrated:** A text input for a comma-separated list of skills utilized or demonstrated by completing the Op., Op Type:** A dropdown menu to select the op type (e.g., `DEV`, `DOC`, `DSN`, `GOV`, etc.) to apply the correct `Op-Type:` label., 2.  **Updated `GUILD_OP_PROTOCOLS.md`:**, A new section added to the `GUILD_OP_PROTOCOLS.md` document titled "Operational Cadence: Full Decomposition vs. Rapid Instantiation.", This section will clearly define the use cases for each method, guiding Operatives on when to use the full `project_decomposition.md` protocol versus the new "Quick Op" template., 3.  **Completed Context Compilation for `CHIRON-GOV-002`:**, A comprehensive operational log for this Guild Op, detailing the design and implementation process for the new protocol..
skills_demonstrated: GitHub Workflow Syntax (YAML for Issue Forms)

tasks.objective: Implement the core Guild interface and a basic RPG journey logging mechanism.

tasks.objective: Implement an operation progress summary feature.
tasks.summary_of_changes: Added operation progress summary functionality, including a new struct `OpProgressSummary` to track operation progress, updated the `Performer` trait to include a method for reporting progress, and modified the `sync` module to use the new progress reporting mechanism.
tasks.critique: The introduction of the `PerformerProgress` enum and associated changes could potentially benefit from more detailed documentation and examples, especially concerning different progress states and their intended usage.
